verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6942>"Sanctify<s%> to me all of the <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> whatever <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>animal.<s%> It is mine."

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2142>"Remember<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> in which you came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage;<s%> for by <S%H2392>strength<s%> of <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> from this <S%H2557>place.<s%> No leavened bread shall be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
This <S%H3117>day<s%> you go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib.<s%>

It shall <S%H3068>be,<s%> when Yahweh shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite,<s%> which he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H776>you,<s%> a land <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> that you shall <S%H5647>keep<s%> this <S%H5656>service<s%> in this <S%H2320>month.<s%>
<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread,<s%> and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> throughout the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and no leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> with <S%H7603>you,<s%> neither shall yeast be <S%H7200>seen<s%> with <S%H1366>you,<s%> in all your borders.

You shall <S%H5046>tell<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5668><s%> 'It is because of <S%H2088>that<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> for me when I came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>'

It shall be for a <S%H226>sign<s%> to you on your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> between your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> that the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> may be in your <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> for with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
You shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> this <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> in its <S%H4150>season<s%> from <S%H3117>year<s%> to <S%H3117>year.<s%>

"It shall <S%H3068>be,<s%> when Yahweh shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> as he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and shall give it <S%H5414>you,<s%>

that you shall set <S%H5674>apart<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> all that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>womb,<s%> and every <S%H6363>firstborn<s%> which you have that <S%H7698>comes<s%> from an <S%H929>animal.<s%> The <S%H2145>males<s%> shall be <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s.

Every <S%H6363>firstborn<s%> of a <S%H2543>donkey<s%> you shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> with a <S%H7716>lamb;<s%> and if you will not <S%H6299>redeem<s%> <S%H6202>it,<s%> then you shall break its neck; and you shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> among your <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

It shall <S%H1121>be,<s%> when your son <S%H7592>asks<s%> you in time to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'What is this?' that you shall tell <S%H2392>him,<s%> 'By strength of <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage;<s%>

and it <S%H6547>happened,<s%> when Pharaoh would <S%H7185>hardly<s%> let us <S%H7971>go,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> both the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> and the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H929>animal.<s%> Therefore I <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> all that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7358>womb,<s%> being <S%H2145>males;<s%> but all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of my <S%H1121>sons<s%> I <S%H6299>redeem.<s%>'

It shall be for a <S%H226>sign<s%> on your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and for <S%H2903>symbols<s%> between your <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> for by <S%H2392>strength<s%> of <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

It <S%H6547>happened,<s%> when Pharaoh had let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that <S%H7971>God<s%> <S%H5148>didn't<s%> lead them by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H3588>although<s%> that was <S%H7138>near;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Lest perhaps the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5162>change<s%> their minds when they <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4421>war,<s%> and they <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>"

but <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5437>led<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea;<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H2571>armed<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> with <S%H7650>him,<s%> for he had made the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> will <S%H6485>surely<s%> <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H5927>you,<s%> and you shall carry up my <S%H6106>bones<s%> away from here with <S%H5927>you.<s%>"
They took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> from <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H864>Etham,<s%> in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them by <S%H3119>day<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> to <S%H5148>lead<s%> them on their <S%H1870>way,<s%> and by <S%H3915>night<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> to give them <S%H215>light,<s%> that they might <S%H3212>go<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> and by <S%H3915>night:<s%>

the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> and the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H4185>didn't<s%> depart from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
